item.title: The Spinning Game Glitch Logo
item.description:
The Spinning Game Glitch Logo

I'm experimenting around with some 3D graphics for the next Game Glitch episode, and here's a draft render. Pretty cool looking.

item.title: Just a Quick Little Reminder...
item.description:
Just a Quick Little Reminder...

Hey! Just a reminder: The platform AveryMiller.org is currently running on is pretty awesome (TheGrid.io), but it's highly experimental, and a bit buggy at times. If you spot any bugs or anything that looks weird, send an email over to Avery@AveryMiller.org or just tweet me!

item.title: Spore - Game Glitch
item.description:
Spore - Game Glitch

Today, I take a look at some glitches in Spore. http://www.AveryMiller.org Copyright Avery Miller Subtitles are available! Disclaimer: Fair use lets me put copyrighted material in my content without explicit permission from the copyright owner. http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fair_use. Credits: Written, Produced, Directed, Animated, and edited by Avery Miller Music: Blue Groove Deluxe by BlueFoxMusic Special thanks to BlueFoxMusic for making epic music!

item.title: Some Older Drawings
item.description:
Some Older Drawings

I figured I mind as well re-post stuff from the old version of AveryMiller.org , so here's two drawings of iDubbbz and JonTron I made a few weeks ago.

item.title: IN YOUR FACE, CANCER!
item.description:
IN YOUR FACE, CANCER!

Just got the call that I do not need to start chemo therapy. IN YOUR FACE, CANCER!

item.title: It's the first time I've given out Reddit gold!
item.description:
It's the first time I've given out Reddit gold!

It's the first time I've given out Reddit gold! I think it's pretty cool.

item.title: Darth Vader Never Said Luke
item.description:
Darth Vader Never Said Luke

I saw the thumbnail for today's episode of GMM, and I did some research...

item.title: More Die Young Drawings
item.description:
More Die Young Drawings

Below is a drawing I just finished making! I thought I'd practice my animation skills a few weeks ago by attempting to replicate a few frames of Vivienne Medrano's Die Young Animation. (Which just hit 7 Million views, by the way!)

item.title: Some Old Zoophobia Photoshopping
item.description:
Some Old Zoophobia Photoshopping

As previously mentioned, when AveryMiller.org was transferred over to TheGrid.io, all the most recent posts I had made were not transferred over. So, here's some of the more recently Zoophobia panels I photoshopped.
